flavorText:
"Beware the gift when you do not know the giver."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales

foreignData.flavorText:
„Hüte dich vor einem Geschenk, wenn du nicht weißt, von wem es stammt."
—Chulane der Geschichtenerzähler
foreignData.name: Feengabe
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn jedes Endsegments und falls du in diesem Zug sowohl einen Kreaturenzauber als auch einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch gewirkt hast, erzeuge einen Hinweis-Spielstein, einen Speise-Spielstein und einen Schatz-Spielstein.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ten cuidado con el regalo cuando no conoces a quien te lo da".
—Chulane, cuentacuentos
foreignData.name: Ofrenda del hada
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de cada paso final, si lanzaste un hechizo de criatura y un hechizo que no sea de criatura este turno, crea una ficha de Pista, una ficha de Comida y una ficha de Tesoro.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Méfie-toi du cadeau quand tu ne sais pas qui te l'offre. »
—Chulane, conteur de fables
foreignData.name: Offrande aux faes
foreignData.text: Au début de chaque étape de fin, si vous avez lancé à la fois un sort de créature et un sort non-créature ce tour-ci, créez un jeton Indice, un jeton Nourriture et un jeton Trésor.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Diffida del regalo di cui non conosci il donatore."
—Chulene, Narratore di Racconti
foreignData.name: Offerta delle Fate
foreignData.text: All'inizio di ogni sottofase finale, se hai lanciato sia una magia creatura che una magia non creatura in questo turno, crea una pedina Indizio, una pedina Cibo e una pedina Tesoro.

foreignData.flavorText:
「知らない者からの贈り物には気をつけた方がいい。」
――伝承の語り部、チュレイン
foreignData.name: フェイの贈り物
foreignData.text: 各終了ステップの開始時に、あなたがこのターンにクリーチャー・呪文とクリーチャーでない呪文の両方を唱えていた場合、手掛かり・トークン１つと食物・トークン１つと宝物・トークン１つを生成する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"주는 사람이 누구인지 모르는 선물은 경계해라."
—이야기꾼, 출레인
foreignData.name: 요정의 제물
foreignData.text: 각 종료단 시작에, 당신이 이 턴에 생물 주문 및 생물이 아닌 주문을 모두 발동했다면, 단서 토큰 한 개, 음식 토큰 한 개 및 보물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Cuidado com o presente quando você não sabe quem o mandou."
— Chulane, Narrador de Contos
foreignData.name: Oferenda de Fadinas
foreignData.text: No início de cada etapa final, se você conjurou uma mágica de criatura e uma mágica não de criatura neste turno, crie uma ficha de Pista, uma ficha de Comida e uma ficha de Tesouro.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Остерегайся подарков, если не знаешь дарителя».
— сказочник Чулейн
foreignData.name: Подношение Фей
foreignData.text: В начале каждого заключительного шага, если в этом ходу вы разыграли и заклинание существа, и не являющееся существом заклинание, создайте одну фишку Улики, одну фишку Еды и одну фишку Клада.

foreignData.flavorText:
「如果你不认识送东西的人，那就千万小心送的东西。」
～说书人楚兰
foreignData.name: 仙儿献物
foreignData.text: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中生物咒语和非生物咒语都施放过，则派出一个线索衍生物，一个食品衍生物和一个珍宝衍生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
「如果你不認識送東西的人，那就千萬小心送的東西。」
～說書人楚蘭
foreignData.name: 仙兒獻物
foreignData.text: 在每個結束步驟開始時，若你本回合中生物咒語和非生物咒語都施放過，則派出一個線索衍生物，一個食品衍生物和一個珍寶衍生物。

name: Fae Offering
originalText: At the beginning of each end step, if you've cast both a creature spell and a noncreature spell this turn, create a Clue token, a Food token, and a Treasure token.

rulings.text: It doesn't matter what happened to the spells after you cast them. They each may have resolved, been countered, failed to resolve for some other reason, or another player may have gained control of them. As long as you cast a creature spell and a noncreature spell that turn, the ability will trigger.

If an effect replaces the number or type of tokens you would create, it applies to each of these tokens individually. For example, if you control Fae Offering and Academy Manufactor, you will create three of each type when the triggered ability resolves.
Creating a Clue token this way isn't the same thing as investigating. Notably, an ability that triggers whenever you investigate won't trigger because Fae Offering's ability created a Clue token.

text: At the beginning of each end step, if you've cast both a creature spell and a noncreature spell this turn, create a Clue token, a Food token, and a Treasure token.
